descriptions: p:Some children and young people seem to withdraw from life. Their anxiety becomes so severe that anything which might have helped seemed to make things worse. They may find it hard to come out of the bedrooms or to leave the house. Parents are left not knowing what to do next.

p:This course will use the lens of Polyvagal theory (Stephen Porges) to understand what is going on for these young people, and will include practical ways in which parents can help themselves and their children.
p:You'll leave with a new way to think about what is happening, and some things to try.
p:This course is available to watch for 6 months after purchase.

p:Dr Naomi Fisher is a clinical psychologist and author of Changing Our Minds, How Children Can Take Control of their Own Learning. She is registered with the HCPC. This webinar is not therapy and should not be used as a replacement for therapy.
